title: *2 Months FREE +$500 Amex * Stunning Luxury Mid-rise on Ladybird Lake
posting_body: Please do your self a favor and check out this brand spanking new luxury apartment overlooking all of downtown and Lady Bird Lake, definitely one of the best views I have seen of our beautiful city!

24/7 athletic center outfitted with cardio theatre, free weights, individual weight machines and expresso bikes featuring interactive display board..You can go ahead and cancel your other gym membership!
They even have a multi-screen sports lounge so invite your friends over and have a watch party or just watch 4 different episode of Game of Thrones at the same time and catch up with the rest of us!
Walk out your front door and you have direct access to Lady Bird Lake hike and bike trails, The Long Center and Auditorium Shores.
You are in walking distance to everything you need.
Call me today and let's go check it out!

** As a full-time apartment locator I will work day and night to help you find the perfect apartment here in the beautiful Austin Tx, my service is completely FREE to you so please don't hesitate and call me today!
Check out our Apartment Hunters Facebook and Google pages to see over one hundred 5 star reviews written from past clients and their experience with me!
